mapper.select: select placard_title,placard_content,publish_time from placard where publish_author = (select manager_no from baserelation where base_no=(select base_no from baseteacher where t_no=#{id})) order by publish_time desc

select placard_title,placard_content,publish_time from placard where publish_author = (select manager_no from baserelation where base_no=(select base_no from trainstudent where stuno=#{id})) order by publish_time desc

select a.placard_no as placard_no,a.placard_title as placard_title,date_format(a.publish_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as publish_time, b.base_name as base_name from placard a,baserelation b where a.placard_type='3' and b.manager_no = a.publish_author

select a.placard_no as placard_no,a.placard_title as placard_title,date_format(a.publish_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as publish_time, b.base_name as base_name from placard a,baserelation b where b.base_no = #{base_no} and b.manager_no = a.publish_author and a.placard_type='3' order by a.publish_time

select a.placard_no as placard_no,a.placard_title as placard_title,date_format(a.publish_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as publish_time, a.placard_content as placard_content,b.base_name as base_name from placard a,baserelation b where a.placard_type='3' and a.placard_no = #{placard_no} and a.publish_author = b.manager_no
select placard_no,placard_title,date_format(publish_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as publish_time, placard_content from placard where placard_type ='2' order by publish_time desc
mapper.delete: delete from placard where placard_type ='2' and placard_no = #{placard_no}
mapper.select: select placard_no,placard_title,date_format(publish_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as publish_time, placard_content,placard_type from placard where (placard_type ='1' or placard_type ='3') and publish_author = #{publish_author} order by publish_time desc
mapper.delete: delete from placard where placard_type !='2' and placard_no = #{placard_no}
